ygData.subject: Re: Idea for fishing pole and slightly stupid idea
ygData.msgSnippet: You know I thought of that, so I went and hunted him and I think all he had was some leather armor or something.  His name is Feddi Dooger.  I ve heard that he
ygData.messageBody:
You know I thought of that, so I went and hunted him and I think all he had
was some leather armor or something. His name is Feddi Dooger. I've heard
that he sometimes carries a lore item knife of some sort, but I wasn't able
to get one and couldn't find any mention of the knife anywhere in ak'anon.

That reminds me, has any tried doing anything with the gnomes in the mino
caves? They never seem to respond to anything I say. What are they doing
down there anyway?

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org

you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

> There is some insane guy in the hills that kills certain PCs and then
> mutters something about the madness. I haven't run into him since I was
> level 12 or so, though I have tried to find him to kill or talk to now
> that I could whoop his ass.
